    • Method Detail

      • authenticate

        public User authenticate(java.lang.String username,
                java.lang.String password)
                  throws DatabaseException
        Authenticates the user. Returns a User object if the user was successfully authenticated, and null if it wasn't
        Parameters:
        username - The username to authenticate
        password - The password to authenticate
        Returns:
        The User that was authenticated, and null if there was no matching username-password combination found
        Throws:
        DatabaseException - If errors occur

      • getAll

        public java.util.List<User> getAll()
                            throws DatabaseException
        Gets all the User from the database and returns it in a list
        Returns:
        A list of all the Users
        Throws:
        DatabaseException - If any errors occur

        Parameters:
